Issue.creator: ga25waq
Issue.summary: Client Identity Chaincode Library not provided by Docker image
Issue.description: error starting container: Failed to generate platform-specific docker build: > Error returned from build: 1 "chaincode/input/src/github.com/my_example_cc/main.go:4:2: > cannot find package "github.com/hyperledger/fabric/core/chaincode/lib/cid" in any of: > ... I'm using the latest fabric-ccenv Docker image. Several other people have the same problem, see also: - https://github.com/yeasy/docker-hyperledger-fabric/issues/4 - https://github.com/yacovm/fabricDeployment/issues/8 - https://lists.hyperledger.org/pipermail/hyperledger-fabric/2017-December/002441.html >
